text:
Éric Laforge (24 January 1964 – 15 February 2020) was a French radio host. He was best known for hosting the show "Le Morning Club", which was broadcast on Classic 21. He also worked for Europe 1, RTL2, NRJ, and Radio France. Laforge was born in Compiègne, France.
Laforge died on 15 February 2020 from surgery-related problems in La Louvière, Belgium at the age of 56.
